thread.title: 'Masala Padam' set for October 9 release
thread.title_full: 'Masala Padam' set for October 9 release - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: 'Masala Padam' set for October 9 release
text: Bobby Simhaa's next, Masala Padam is all set for a release on October 9th. The film starring Bobby Simhaa and Mirchi Shiva is directed by cinematographer Laxman. The film recently passed the censor board with a clean U certificate. Producer Vijay Raghavendra declaring the release date has said that 'Masala Padam' will be a thought provoking film that will bring audience of all class to the screens. Lakshmy Devy, who plays the female lead in the film, has also penned the screenplay for the film. Touted as a complete commercial entertainer, Masala Padam, allegedly, is about filmmakers and film critics.
